title: Challenger Jacket Sizes?
body:
Basically I want to know if anyone else is experiencing weird measurements in terms of even the XS being too big for them. 
I'm 22 and am pretty tall, and I usually fit into a Large, but according to these measurements even an XS is at least 6cm more.

And yes, I've catered for the fact it's in cm/inches, the fact that it's suppose to have some leeway as it shouldn't be constricting your body, and got several people to measure to me to make sure it's correct and nope still too small for it. Never have I been close to fitting into a small.

Anyone else who made it having similar/any problems with it?

Thanks,
Peasy

replies.body: Trade with k1ng - he's probably got a few jackets lying around that you'd fit into.
